mapper.select: select no ,writer ,subject ,date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') date , hit from test where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST( NO , WRITER , SUBJECT , DATE ) VALUES((select ifnull(max(no),0)+1 from test seq) /*글번호 */ , #{writer} /*작성자*/ , #{subject} /*제목*/ , #{content} /*글내용*/ ,sysdate() )
